overview:
With more than 15 years of experience in graphic design and web production, Daniel has developed interactive content for courses, websites, and marketing promotions. He has also created and managed multiple graphic department networks, ensuring smooth operations and productivity.

An exceptional visual and verbal communicator, Daniel enjoys building new business relationships and nurturing existing connections. Leveraging his proven problem-solving skills, he has a solid track record of seeing complex projects through from conception to completion.
